comment.body:
It looks like an extension issue (it happens even with all filter lists disabled), but it seems that it has been fixed in version 4.2 which is currently in beta.

As a workaround, you can add this rule:
```adblock
||login.betha.cloud/servicelogin/js/linkedinlogin.js
```
to user rules.
It should fixes this issue, but it will be not possible to login using LinkedIn account.

issue.title: oucoraphothed.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://oucoraphothed.com/click.php?key=0g61n1v0084b04xw9y0l&visitor_id=che9oprilrdamjg0hpig&zoneid=4697302&campaignid=6850456&type=Push&age=17&creative_id=265319&campaign_id=78492&site_id=3334&placement_id=11627753&user_activity=known&countryname=PT](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foucoraphothed.com%2Fclick.php%3Fkey%3D0g61n1v0084b04xw9y0l%26visitor_id%3Dche9oprilrdamjg0hpig%26zoneid%3D4697302%26campaignid%3D6850456%26type%3DPush%26age%3D17%26creative_id%3D265319%26campaign_id%3D78492%26site_id%3D3334%26placement_id%3D11627753%26user_activity%3Dknown%26countryname%3DPT) ### Comment Username: @Oda-se > Em Notificações do MacBook Pro, há muitos dias que me surge na barra das notificações à direita, o aviso de que o comptador está ingectado, que a núvem está a ser violada, etc. Clicando abreo o Safari e surge a porcaria do site para accionar a defesa do computador. Já tentei de tudo e não consigo bloquear esta melguice de primeira apanha, que só me entope as notificações. > Queria também pedir a vossa ajuda para saber como posso eradicar completa e definitivamente os ficheiros da Kaspersky. Cometi o erro de uma vez experimentar e esse vírus chamado anti-vírus e ao serviço da espionagem russa nunca mais me largou. Já tentei instalar algumas aplicações e não posso porque diz que pode entrar em conflito com o Kaspersky, supostamente já apagado do meu computador. > Obrigado e bom resto de semana. ### Screenshots

```adblock
@@||theglobeandmail.com^$stealth=referrer
```

I will add rules to hide share buttons and newsletters.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Hi! In general, it's better to address this to Apple support if your MacBook has malware.
As I recall, `kavremover` can help to remove Kaspersky software, but it's only for Windows - better to ask their support. Perhaps they have an alternative solution for Mac.

> Obrigado e bom resto de semana.

Thank you and have a nice day!

Username: @Oda-se<https://github.com/Oda-se>

Em Notificações do MacBook Pro, há muitos dias que me surge na barra das notificações à direita, o aviso de que o comptador está ingectado, que a núvem está a ser violada, etc. Clicando abreo o Safari e surge a porcaria do site para accionar a defesa do computador. Já tentei de tudo e não consigo bloquear esta melguice de primeira apanha, que só me entope as notificações.
Queria também pedir a vossa ajuda para saber como posso eradicar completa e definitivamente os ficheiros da Kaspersky. Cometi o erro de uma vez experimentar e esse vírus chamado anti-vírus e ao serviço da espionagem russa nunca mais me largou. Já tentei instalar algumas aplicações e não posso porque diz que pode entrar em conflito com o Kaspersky, supostamente já apagado do meu computador.
Obrigado e bom resto de semana.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version Version 2.10.0.1272 release ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://music.apple.com/ ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Social Media filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Rules in Social Media filter list is blocking **features**, not ads or even annoyances. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1 (filter off):
Screenshot 2 (filter on):
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @Alex-302 Yup, the first one unblocks the context menu on each song correctly, so the corresponding rule should be removed: ```adblock music.apple.com##.songs-list-row__controls > div.songs-list-row__context-menu ``` To unblock the Add button and the context menu for album/playlist, however, this rule should also be removed: ```adblock music.apple.com##.container-detail-header > div.secondary-actions ``` --- I see you want to hide the Share entry, but unfortunately the title is localized, so in my case for example, this selector will not match. I guess you can use :last-child for now but this is not reliable. ```adblock music.apple.com##.contextual-menu-item > button[title="Share"] ``` Do we really need to hide this? Because in your case, or for non-logged-in users, they'll see a button on each song to trigger the context menu, but since you hide "Share" which is the only entry, nothing will be shown. This makes it feels broken too.

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

issue.title: please not block `acs.m.taobao.com`
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdguardHome v0.107.29

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.dingtalk.com/download/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bd04be4e4dc0a6ac20ec9e27ab46d743b5fde9eb/SpywareFilter/sections/mobile.txt#L216

From above line, `acs.m.taobao.com` was blocked, which causes Android dingtalk application updating check fails.

Moreover, according to AdAway/adaway.github.io#87, blocking the domain would result in an Alibaba/Taobao account login failure.

And you can find some taobao apis using the domain via Google search or GitHub search.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: done. But on my end Aliexpress, Alibaba, Taobao and Alipay apps work fine.
